title: BRIEF-Wilmot Matthews Acquired 10 Mln Common Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics
text:
BRIEF-Wilmot Matthews Acquired 10 Mln Common Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 25, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Wilmot Matthews Acquired 10 Mln Common Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics Sept 25 (Reuters) - Wilmot L. Matthews: * ACQUISITION OF UNITS OF SQI DIAGNOSTICS INC * WILMOT L. MATTHEWS - HAS ACQUIRED 10 MILLION COMMON SHARES AND 10 MILLION COMMON SHARE PURCHASE WARRANTS OF SQI DIAGNOSTICS

BRIEF-Wilmot Matthews Acquired 10 Mln Common Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics
